get_started_main_subheader: Indexing is the process of entering information from historical records into an online, searchable database.
get_started_steps_java_2: Click Run or Open to begin the installation.
get_started_steps_java_3: Locate the FamilySearch Indexing icon on your desktop, and double click the icon to open the program.
get_started_steps_java_4: Click Register for a New Account and follow the steps to get registered or sign in with your FamilySearch or LDS Account
get_started_steps_nojava_2: Follow the steps on familysearch.org/indexing to get involved.
get_started_basics_subheader: Check out these indexing resources to help you get started with indexing historical records.
